All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AmbientLight
    An ambient light source represents a fixed intensity and fixed color light source that affects all objects in the scene equally.
    Camera
    object use to view the object in the scene
    Color
    Wrapper class for java.jwt.Color The constructors operate with any non-negative RGB values.
    Coordinate
    Class Coordinate is the basic class representing a coordinate for Cartesian coordinate system.
    Cylinder
    class Cylinder is cylinder in a 3d space
    DirectionalLight
    class representing a directional light
    Geometries
    Class of Geometries
    Geometry
    abstract class of Geometry
    ImageWriter
    Image writer class combines accumulation of pixel color matrix and finally producing a non-optimized jpeg image from this matrix.
    Intersectable
    class Intersectable to define a method which receives a ray and returns its intersection points with the geometry in the geometries classes
    Intersectable.GeoPoint
    point and it geometry
    Light
    abstract class representing a light
    LightSource
    interface that represent a light source
    Main
    Test program for the 3st stage
    Material
    class of material and there shininess
    Plane
    class plane is a Plane a point and vector 3d space
    Point3D
    Point3D (point in space) - a fundamental object in geometry - a point with 3 coordinates
    PointLight
    class representing a point light
    Polygon
    Polygon class represents two-dimensional polygon in 3D Cartesian coordinate system
    Ray
    Ray - a foundational object in geometry the group of points on a straight line that are on one relative side To a given point on the line called the beginning of the foundation.
    RayTracerBase
    abstract class that renders the image
    RayTracerBasic
    Find the intersection and the scenes geometries and renders the image
    Render
    create an image from the scene
    Scene
    the scene name, also initializes an empty collection of geometries
    Sphere
    class Sphere is sphere in a 3d space
    SpotLight
    class representing a spot light
    Triangle
    class Triangle is polygon with vertexes in a 3d space
    Tube
    class tube is Tube in a 3d space
    Util
    Util class is used for some internal utilities, e.g.
    Vector
    class Vector is a fundamental object in geometry with direction and size, defined by the end point
